title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Drain pasta and quickly mix with pancetta, eggs, and cheese.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: A simple and healthy breakfast or snack made with toasted bread, smashed avocado, and toppings of your choice.
ingredients: Optional: cherry tomatoes, poached egg, chili flakes
instructions: Toast the bread until golden brown.
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the avocado mix over the toast.
Add toppings like tomatoes, egg, or chili flakes.
